name: The Myth of Legolden Elf
description:
Go on a journey to retrieve the pieces of the mythical Legolden Elf's statue!

The Myth of Legolden Elf was originally created for the Unity x LEGO Ideas contest, using some assets from the Unity LEGO Microgame pack.

It has all the essential elements of a true platformer: peculiar characters, shiny collectibles, intriguing puzzles and, of course, platforms! You'll have to be agile enough to get all the colored bricks, curious enough to find the secret key, or smart enough to reach the top of the hill. But, most importantly, you'll have lots of fun while you jump, collect and solve quests.
